comment: nothing to be said, just take her.

Hands down (hehe) the best professor I've had at KSU. She is very nice and it's almost impossible to fail this class. She provides study guides, PowerPoints, and extra credit. The textbook is absolutely necessary, but you can find it for free online. The lectures were fun and I learned a lot of interesting and relevant things.

Although I wasn't able to attend class often, Professor Hand made it vey easy to pass. There are 3 practice test per test that was for a participation grade, 5 test, and an optional final. She is very easy to talk to and you can tell she really cares for her students.

Professor Hand is great. She truly cares about her students and provides everything needed to succeed. Her class is very organized and she is an easy grader. I learned a lot in her class but it was not overwhelming or stressful. Take her class!

I had Professor Hand for COM 3100 before and loved her, and I love this class even more! She is more passionate about the topics we cover in this class, from the gaming, film and tv industries to theory. She provides extra credit opportunities and study guides for tests, and we have a final project. I highly recommend Professor Hand! 10/10!

Professor Hand is one of my favorite professors so far! She has a great attendance policy and is very understanding. With that being said, attendance is still mandatory and is counted as part of your grade. She provides study guides and extra credit opportunities for the tests. She's super nice and I loved her class!

Professor Hand is one of my favorite professors. She genuinely cares about her students' success. The class has 3 tests that are open book, attendance, 3 career readiness activities and a final project. She is a pretty easy grader and very easy to please. She is the most caring professor at KSU, be nice to her.

Amazing lecturer she is very accessible to students outside of class and she wants students to succeed. Her lectures are interesting and class typically ends early. Easy to talk to for career advice and gives great feedback on assignments. One of the best MENT professors!
She is one of the best lecturers at Kennesaw State. Also she's very easy to talk and has the course very organized and clear. Definitely taking her again if I have the chance.

Prof. Hand was great. You can attend her class either in person or on zoom. You don't need the textbook but it's helpful on tests. There are only 4 tests but she typically curves them and provides study guides and tons of extra credit. There is a participation grade for attendance so not going to class will likely hurt your grade.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Shes very lenient and allowed for resubmissions and optional assignments which was really nice. However, shes a REALLY hard grader. She deducts points for minor errors and her feedback feels like shes nitpicking. I enjoyed the writing assignments and doing the work but I feel like her grading comments are excessive..

Professor Hand is one of the most caring professors I've had. She is kind and genuinely wants her students to succeed. The course by nature is test heavy but she does give extra credit and participation counts for a considerable amount. All her lectures are uploaded to D2L and you can attend lectures via Zoom.

Prof. Hand is the best! She is so kind and cares about our success. The summer class had a fair amount of work but it wasn't unreasonable. She allows you to resubmit papers if you're not satisfied with your grade. Gives amazing and helpful feedback. Final project at the end isn't hard if you don't leave it for the last minute. TAKE HER IF YOU CAN!!
Class was very easy and Professor Hand is so nice and connects with her students. Would take every class with her if i could 10/10. All tests open book.

She is absolutely wonderful! Actually cares about students and their futures. Shares tips and opportunities for the industry throughout the semester and is great at replying to emails. As for the work, everything is simple and enjoyable. Simply do your best and you will thrive in her class. Highly recommend!!

She was a great professor. Her test were very straightforward from the lectures and links she posted. Also, she was very easy to talk to about things other than class. The final project for a digital portfolio isn't terrible difficult as long as you follow the rubric. I would highly highly recommend you take Professor Hand for this course.

This new young professor is highly helpful and fun. She added a project along with 4 test and it helps shoot up your grade for an easy 100. I went from a 69-82 just from attendance, Project, and final exam. You could pass the first two exams and still get a B. I would take her online if she does it online . Easy A/B straight from PowerPoints.

Strict on APA but allows you to resubmit paper. I have had her 3 times so far and she even wrote my recommendation for my scholarship. I love her!!! Take her as many times as you can. She is the best!!

Professor Hand was a kind and knowledgable professor. I learned a lot from her powerpoints so I didn't bother reading the textbooks. Her tests aren't hard and she offered lots of extra credit. She has a strict attendence policy (can only miss 2 classes) but I'd reccomend going to her class to do well anyways. I would take her again.

Lindsey Hand has been my favorite professor at KSU so far. She makes study guides for each test and offers extra credit frequently. While she does have a strict attendance policy, her lectures are fun so you won't want to skip. While she recommends buying the textbook, you can study her powerpoints and do very well.

For Intro (the class) , she is really cool and sweet. She gives out study guides for her test and they aren't hard. For Investigation and sources (the class), she breaks down your huge paper into multiple parts so you are basically writing your paper piece by piece. You can work with a partner so it makes it easier. My partner and I got an A

Great teacher! We had a quiz every two weeks (you need your book), weekly discussion posts, and a section of our semester long Literature Review due every week. You turn the paper in in sections and she gives you feedback of things to fix for your final paper. You can write on your own or choose a partner and it is due on the last day of class.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: This is my second time having Professor Hand and Im so thankful for her! Shes super nice and always answers emails very quickly! Her grading system is super clear and she explains from the beginning of class what she expects of us from our final project so its not difficult at all. I wish I could take Professor Hand for all of my classes.

Professor Hand is one of the best professors Ive had so far! Shes super nice and always answers emails very quickly and gives great feedback on assignment. Theres discussion posts every week and a semester long paper that she breaks down into sections to make it easier for you! I wish I could have her as a professor for all my classes!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: Lindsey is out of this world! She loves to encourage discussion in class, and is more interested in us sharing our opinions on the industry than in lecturing about mundane concepts. She's funny, available outside of class, and so helpful. Take her!
Prof. Hand is amazing! Super nice and friendly. Classes are challenging, but not overwhelming. We worked on a semester-long paper, which is broken into sections so it is very manageable.

Prof. Hand is really great. She cares about her students and wants them to succeed. She gives really good feedback and in genuinely interested in wanting students to learn. I highly recommend taking her.

I loved the clear layout of this class. The end goal is to write a research paper in APA format, but she gives you good feedback throughout the semester. There were discussion posts every week and a quiz every couple of weeks. I would definitely recommend taking her.

Professor Hand is a great teacher. There is a lot of discussions you have to post but thats because it was an online class. She will help you out in anything that you need. You have to write a research paper throughout the whole entire semester and you had a partner so it wasn't that bad. TAKE HER!

Professor Hand is GREAT. I took this class online, I had her for COMM2020 also. There is a lot of work(10 discussions, 10 quizzes, 3 tests and a HUGE research paper). You work on the paper in sections, she gives you feedback and allows you to resubmit and paper assignment for a better grade. She is nice and really gives you many chances to succeed.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Taking this class online was A LOT. There were discussion posts, quizzes, assignments & tests, so you have to stay on top of the work every week. The quizzes are very short though. My only problem with her is that she takes a long time to return grades. You have a big paper at the end of the semester but you turn in parts of it during the semester.

She's a great teacher. She knows how to have fun in the class, but she is still very serious about work. We did 3 case studies, and you work pretty much all semester on a paper. Her class isn't hard, but it isn't exactly easy. Pay attention to due dates and instructions and you will be fine.

Professor Hand was wonderful. Had her for an online class. Struggled at first, but because of her thorough feedback on all of my work throughout the semester, I was able to pass the class with a B. Very thankful. Would recommend.

I don't have my final grade yet though I'm expecting an A. I can say this teacher is one of the best you can have. she gives you beyond enough chances to get an A, with the fact that the class is a huge paper divided into sections. you also have a partner which should help you throughout the semester.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Tests? Not many

comment: This was my 2nd class with Prof Hand, and she is amazing! She is so caring, kind, and helpful to students. No tests in 4424, just 3, 2-3pg case papers, a group project, and a main research project broken into a few parts. We were able to choose between writing a paper and making a project in Adobe Spark. The discussions in this class are so fun!

she made this class so much easier than other professors would have. she lets you resubmit your papers to receive full credit and gives very good feedback in what you did well on and what you could work on. im not the best at writing and was SUPER nervous about this class but she made it great and really worked with me when i was unsure of things.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: This is my second time taking Prof. Hand and she's still really great. This class requires a lot of brainpower since it's an online class but she's very helpful if you send her an email about any of the assignments. It's very hard to fail this class with her as a professor because she makes everything easy and accessible.

I really loved her class, it is very easy but you do learn from it. Only one paper for the term, but you learn how to write better and she is understanding and helpful if you need it! TAKE HER!! She also gives random extra credit opportunities.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I really enjoy her class, good lectures, you can tell she cares. take it cmon
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: amazing teacher, will take her class definitely again!! not only you learn but you are also graded fairly! she is also extremely organized!
She is a very sweet professor. I would take her anytime! Easy class... not the best content.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Hand is an excellent professor. She is very knowledgeable about the material and has a passion for research. She facilitates good class discussion and she gives good feedback on assignments. The only downside is that the course content is dull and boring. This class is an easy A with take home quizzes and extra credit.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Throughout the semester you'll write a literature review paper, it's just split up into different sections. If you send it to her early she'll give you specific feedback which is really helpful. The other content is boring, but it will help you and it's important to learn. The paper will make up the majority of your grade. I would take her again!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: This was the first year she's taught public speaking F2F and it was a great course however, it's a mediocre class and the grading is pretty ridiculous. Practice your speech, do the peer evaluations and outlines and you'll be fine.

Took her 8-week summer class. She's so nice and helpful! The class is 1 big communication research paper, but she breaks it into sections so it's very manageable. Pick a topic you're interested in. She'll critique your drafts before they're due if you ask for help- do this for an A! The quizzes are easy and open-note. Highly recommend for Com 2020!

You have to show uo to class!!! There is a 10 page paper but you work on it all semester and she helps you every step of the way. If you submit your paper before the deadline she will grade it and give it back to you so that you can fix everything before really turning it in. Subject matter is boring so lectures can be dry. But, she is great!!

Very helpful & will provide great feedback. The biggest challenge is the literature review paper, that you will work on the entire semester. Rather than requiring us to have it turned in all at once, she allows  students to work on it per section, which is very helpful. You will know how to write in AP style by the end of the semester. TAKE HER! :)

Professor Hand is very sweet and helpful. The class content is unfortunately extremely boring, so lectures are long and dry. She posts everything online and doesn't like tests so the few tests we have are online and so easy. She is more than willing to help you, and she genuinely wants you to succeed. Attendance is mandatory though, so show up!

I would take Ms. Hand again. She doesn't have the best lectures, but she is extremely helpful. I asked questions throughout the semester and feel like I learned a lot. Don't buy the book because you really won't need it.
